info.infotext: This was such a pivotal moment of pride for me and you. I remember being soooo proud you finally got the recognition you deserved. The first of many awards.
This year we also graduated high school. And we got to experience it all together as we did everything big in our lives to come.
I remember not liking my suit but i though it doesnt really matter because you look stunning for both of us.
Ah yes more birthdays. And the beginnings of my beard.
Dont really remember what we did that halloween but i have a small pumpkin ^^.

This was kinda our first beach together. We didnt go alone till later years but this was the first time we were at a beach together. I have some good and some bad memories from that trip but oh well …
THE SMALL BENCH APPEARS AS FAR BACK AS 2016 THATS CRAZYYY.
Prom again … kinda. I really had a good time at this thing before prom i remember. And i def liked my outfit a lot more.
